CustomField.formula: IF(LeadId==null, IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Account.RTL_OccupationF__c),Contact.Account.RTL_Occupation_Details__r.RTL_Occupation_Desc__c,CASE(Contact.Account.RTL_Occupation__c, "Government / State Enterprise Officer",$Label.RTL_Occupation1_Government , "Business owner", $Label.RTL_Occupation2_Business_Owner, "Police", $Label.RTL_Occupation3_Police, "Military", $Label.RTL_Occupation4_Military, "Students", $Label.RTL_Occupation5_Students, "Employee", $Label.RTL_Occupation6_Employee, "Housewives", $Label.RTL_Occupation7_Housewives, "Professionals", $Label.RTL_Occupation8_Professionals, "Others / Un-employed", $Label.RTL_Occupation9_Others, Contact.Account.RTL_Occupation__c )), IF( Not(ISBLANK(Text(Lead.RTL_Occupation__c))) , CASE(TEXT(Lead.RTL_Occupation__c), "Government / State Enterprise Officer",$Label.RTL_Occupation1_Government , "Business owner", $Label.RTL_Occupation2_Business_Owner, "Police", $Label.RTL_Occupation3_Police, "Military", $Label.RTL_Occupation4_Military, "Students", $Label.RTL_Occupation5_Students, "Employee", $Label.RTL_Occupation6_Employee, "Housewives", $Label.RTL_Occupation7_Housewives, "Professionals", $Label.RTL_Occupation8_Professionals, "Others / Un-employed", $Label.RTL_Occupation9_Others, TEXT(Lead.RTL_Occupation__c) ),TEXT(Lead.RTL_Occupation__c)))
CustomField.label: Occupation
